attributes.action: identify and implement ways to incentivise the start-up, and support the growth, of UK companies producing renewable microgeneration technologies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
One of the arguments against the UK taking a lone stance on greenhouse gas reduction is that it will leave us economically fragile. One way to minimise this impact would be to support and incentivise the use of home-grown UK-based technologies.

Firstly, the Government should identify ways to better support UK microgeneration companies in start-up and growth, and secondly, consumers should be encouraged (mandated, if possible) to purchase technologies largely produced in the UK.
